name: Drum byMT play real instrument
description:
Picture yourself a great drummer in a hot rock band with “Drum byMT play real instrument”! Meet a drum kit simulator that completely replaces the real thing for you. Prove yourself a virtuoso from the very first song You don't need any drumming skills to play on the drum kit simulator. Our drums are incredibly easy to use - you will almost instinctively start playing them from the very first movement! The application has three levels of difficulty that will help you develop a perfect sense of rhythm. Play your drums wherever you go With “Drum byMT play real instrument”, the whole drum kit is always at hand. Just keep on mastering your playing skills wherever you are! Drum away at all times and in all places being sure that no one would object to it - there should be no limitations for your creativity. Songs and musical styles to suit every taste Discover a vast array of songs in any of our three playlists - Free, Top, Rock or Pop. Play it away, score more points, and power-level your drumming skills! Enjoy our pleasant and user-friendly interface that will allow you to immerse in the atmosphere of overwhelming realism and feel like a real star of the scene! “Drum byMT play real instrument” is the best solution for both beginners and professional drummers.
